short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and CanadaBuys posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on December 16, 2022 by 2:00 pm EST. All bids submitted after 2:00 pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
description: Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) has a requirement for two (2) Medium Trucks with Dump Box in accordance with Annex A \\(u2013 Specifications Medium Trucks with Dump Box, delivered Duty  Paid (DDP) to PSPC, 950 Ages Drive, Unit #A, Ottawa, Ontario K1G 6B3. Delivery is requested between April 1, 2023 and  March 31, 2024.
